Question: You have a stakeholder on your project who has a reputation as being very difficult. Start the project when you know he's out of town and send him a meeting invite to cover your tracks.
Seek him out and begin to open communications with him about what is changing and why.
Correct: Seek him out and begin to open communications with him about what is changing and why.
